title: Rhubarb and Orange Blossom Jam

ingredients.content: 28 oz rhubarb, cut into pieces (¾ in.), divided

preparations.content: Place 14 oz rhubarb into mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 6<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.
Place remaining 14 oz rhubarb into mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 6<b>.
Add reserved rhubarb, sugar and orange juice and place simmering basket instead of measuring cup onto mixing bowl lid to prevent splashing. Cook <b>30 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>.

Test setting point of jam (see Tip). Add orange flower water and mix <b>10 sec/speed 2<b>. Pour into sterilized jars. Turn hot jars upside down for 10 minutes before turning right side up and allowing to cool. Serve or store in a cool dry place.

hintsAndTricks: Setting point test: place a saucer in the freezer <b>(5-10 minutes).<b> Place 1 tsp jam onto the saucer. When cool, push jam with your finger. If it wrinkles, it is ready. If not, cook jam for a further <b>2 min/230°F/speed 3<b>, then test again.
The jam will keep unopened for several months. Once open, store in the refrigerator and use within 1 month.
